Reviews/Synopsis
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please go to the following website for detailed information:
 <a href="
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Genocyber" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Genocyber</a>

I really enjoyed the first episode of Genocyber. Great action, incredibly violent sequences. Horrifically gory in parts. High quality early 90's (pre-CGI) animation. Character design really strong -- especially the mercenary cyborgs assassins! 
   Genocyber is definitely one of the best utlra-violent sci-fi/action films out there, and having all the episodes together is great! The story revolves around a huge corporation, a psychic, a little girl, and government experimentations.
 Genocyber is this almost god-like creaure that was somehow formed by two psychic sisters. The plot line is a little hard to follow at times, but the action scenes are top notch.  
     Be warned that the english language and english subtitles are dramatically different (especially in Episode 1). I would recommend watching it twice, or watching with both the english audio and english captioning turned on.
